title: Do you still go IE + shiv on Yasuo?
body:
Do you just take 10% crit in runes now to make up for IE nerf or do I just go full AD runes and do some strange build Like PD + Ghostblade?

But he still needs the bonus crit damage from IE so would this work? 
- IE (40), Triforce(20), Ghostblade(30) + 5% from runes.

build order would be something like [Zeal -> crit cloak (40%)]  grabbing cheap crit so you can fight but from there I don't know what the most efficient build path would be. maybe just finish ghostblade after that then triforce then IE?



NVM im dumb: Shiv + IE + tri = 100% exactly (40+20+40)

replies.body:
100% crit is not needed, same old build, however if you really want it you could always switch out last whisper for ghostblade. {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3035}} or{{item:3142}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3026}}

Edit: don't build triforce on yasuo, it barely benefits him at all plus the wasted mana and ap, raw stats are just better and pen is needed on any assasin/fighter.
90% works fine just means there may be that 1 in 10 chance that you don't crit
I am confused as to why one would need 100% crit chance but if you want it then Shiv+IE+10(20)% in runes
I could personally care less about the nerf since I already built shiv ie and tri on yasuo anyways, this is just another excuse for me to continue with my build.
Triforce For the extra 20% Crit chance needed.{{item:3078}}
